com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base

Class BaseExecutableComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseExecutableComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExecutable, IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAutoStartableComponent, BaseExecutableComponentPerformingRecurringTask, TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer

    public abstract class BaseExecutableComponent
extends BaseComponent
implements IExecutable
    This is the base superclass of all executable components.
    Author:
    Guillaume Jacob (guillaume.jacob@orcsoftware.com)

      • start

        public void start()
           throws ExecutableStartException,
                  IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: IExecutable
        Starts this executable component.
        Specified by:
        start in interface IExecutable
        Throws:
        ExecutableStartException - if an error occurred which prevented the executable component from starting
        IllegalStateException - if either of the following occurs:
        • the component's initialization state is not InitializationState.INITIALIZED
        • the component's execution state is not ExecutionState.STOPPED

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws IllegalStateException
        Description copied from interface: IExecutable
        Stops this executable component.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface IExecutable
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if either of the following occurs:
        • the component's initialization state is not InitializationState.INITIALIZED
        • the component's execution state is not ExecutionState.RUNNING

      • preShutdown

        protected void preShutdown()
                    throws OperationException
        Description copied from class: BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
        Invoked at the begining of the shut-down phase. Can be implemented to automate the execution of certain operations on the component just before its shut-down.
        Overrides:
        preShutdown in class BaseComponent
        Throws:
        OperationException - if one of the invoked operation fails

      • doStart

        protected abstract void doStart()
                         throws ExecutableStartException
        Performs the actual starting of this executable component.
        Throws:

      • assertExecutionState

        public void assertExecutionState(ExecutionState expectedState)
        Checks that this component's execution state is as expected.
        Parameters:
        expectedState - the expected component execution state
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if expectedState is null
        IllegalStateException - if the component's actual execution state is not the same as expectedState
